verses.verse: Then <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up with his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and they <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it, and <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of it; even to the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3968>Meah<s%> they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it, to the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananeel.<s%>

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%> And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H566>Imri.<s%>

But the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> did the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5574>Hassenaah<s%> <S%H1129>build,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> also laid the <S%H7136>beams<s%> thereof, and <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof.

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Urijah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6976>Koz.<s%> And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4898>Meshezabeel.<s%> And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1195>Baana.<s%>

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them the <S%H8621>Tekoites<s%> <S%H2388>repaired;<s%> but their <S%H117>nobles<s%> <S%H935>put<s%> not their <S%H6677>necks<s%> to the <S%H5656>work<s%> of their <S%H113>LORD.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6454>Paseah,<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1152>Besodeiah;<s%> they laid the <S%H7136>beams<s%> thereof, and <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, and the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof.

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4424>Melatiah<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonite,<s%> and <S%H3036>Jadon<s%> the <S%H4824>Meronothite,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> and of <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> to the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>river.<s%>

<S%H5921>Next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2736>Harhaiah,<s%> of the <S%H6884>goldsmiths.<s%> <S%H5921>Next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him also <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of one of the <S%H7543>apothecaries,<s%> and they <S%H5800>fortified<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the <S%H7342>broad<s%> <S%H2346>wall.<s%>

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H3042>Jedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2739>Harumaph,<s%> even <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%> And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2407>Hattush<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2813>Hashabniah.<s%>

<S%H4441>Malchijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2766>Harim,<s%> and <S%H2815>Hashub<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6355>Pahathmoab,<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4060>piece,<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H8574>furnaces.<s%>

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3873>Halohesh,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> he and his <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

The <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2586>Hanun,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2182>Zanoah;<s%> they <S%H1129>built<s%> it, and <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> to the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

But the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4441>Malchiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H1021>Bethhaccerem;<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> it, and <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof.

But the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H7968>Shallun<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3626>Colhozeh,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpah;<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> it, and <S%H2926>covered<s%> it, and <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H7975>Siloah<s%> by the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and to the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5802>Azbuk,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H1049>Bethzur,<s%> to the place <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H6913>sepulchers<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and to the <S%H1295>pool<s%> that was <S%H6213>made,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H7348>Rehum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani.<s%> <S%H5921>Next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> in his <S%H6418>part.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H942>Bavai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah.<s%>

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H5829>Ezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H5927>going<s%> up to the <S%H5402>armory<s%> at the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2079>Zabbai<s%> <S%H2734>earnestly<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4060>piece,<s%> from the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6976>Koz<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece,<s%> from the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> even to the <S%H8503>end<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib.<s%>
And <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H2815>Hashub<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> their <S%H1004>house.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6055>Ananiah<s%> by his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H1131>Binnui<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> to the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall, even to the <S%H6438>corner.<s%>

<S%H6420>Palal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H186>Uzai,<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall, and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> which <S%H3318>lies<s%> out from the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> that was by the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6551>Parosh.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H6077>Ophel,<s%> to the place <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> that <S%H3318>lies<s%> out.

<S%H310>After<s%> them the <S%H8621>Tekoites<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece,<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4026>tower<s%> that <S%H3318>lies<s%> out, even to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H6077>Ophel.<s%>
From above the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> them <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> also <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah,<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah,<s%> and <S%H2586>Hanun<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6764>Zalaph,<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> his <S%H5393>chamber.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4441>Malchiah<s%> the <S%H6885>goldsmith's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> to the <S%H1004>place<s%> of the <S%H5411>Nethinims,<s%> and of the <S%H7402>merchants,<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4663>Miphkad,<s%> and to the <S%H5944>going<s%> up of the <S%H6438>corner.<s%>

And <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H5944>going<s%> up of the <S%H6438>corner<s%> to the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H6884>goldsmiths<s%> and the <S%H7402>merchants.<s%>
